game.name: HEMA. Humetal Era Morphose Arms
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: 《HEMA》is a Character Action Game Mixing with 2D Metroidvania. Beating the AI-Robot army – Humetal with Stylish Combo Combat !! Explore the Humetal Base and Discover Hidden Sub-Gadget And equipment !! Beat the Boss to Upgrade your Character to perform more Flashy Combat Skill !!
game.shortDescriptionEn: 《HEMA》is a Character Action Game Mixing with 2D Metroidvania. Beating the AI-Robot army – Humetal with Stylish Combo Combat !! Explore the Humetal Base and Discover Hidden Sub-Gadget And equipment !! Beat the Boss to Upgrade your Character to perform more Flashy Combat Skill !!
